The list names independent counsels appointed by the special Division of the Court for Appointing Independent Counsels, United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia, summarizes areas of investigation and results, and includes cost information from audits by the Government Accountability Office. The list of independent counsels and special prosecutors appointed by the Special Division of the Court includes those whose appointments are public record, as well as those kept confidential. Cost information was derived from GAO audit reports on expenditures. Total Costs of Investigations for 20 independent counsel or special prosecutor investigations have been kept confidential unless deemed in the public interest to release by the Special Division of the Court. The total costs of 20 independent counsel or special prosecutor investigations have amounted to approximately $228,712,589 as of September 30, 2005. The release of these costs is subject to the discretion of the Special Division of the Court or upon the return of an indictment or criminal information.
